item.title: Skillcape Help
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“liivapuu13, post:2, topic:407842”]Get skillcape emotes and gfx from spotanim.java in client files btw 823 is barrage gfx
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,508432.0.html
you can leach from my server if you want…[/quote]
Where are your skillcape shit, what files?

item.title: Skillcape Help
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

This is in My clickingButtons.java that I’ve added and stuff. But I’ve looked over it and all of the IDs are differen’t but when I perform the emote it justs gives me a barrage over myself. No animation or GFX.

[code=java]if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9747 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 10639 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9748) { //attack
c.gfx0(823);
c.startAnimation(4959);
}

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9753 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 10641 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9754) { //Defence
c.gfx0(824);
c.startAnimation(4961);
}

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9750 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 10640 || c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] == 9751) { //Strength

}
